org.libex.concurrent

Class ConcurrentRunningAverage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libex.concurrent.ConcurrentRunningAverage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RunningAverage

    @ThreadSafe
@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public class ConcurrentRunningAverage
extends Object
implements RunningAverage
    Maintains a running average in a thread-safe manner.
    Author:
    John Butler
